basics.name: Inam Ul Huq
basics.label: Software Developer
basics.summary:
Inam is a passionate software developer from Sialkot, Pakistan. He mainly builds Web applications but has built Mobile and Desktop applications too.

He keeps a close eye on new technologies and trends in the software development world through his GitHub and Twitter accounts, where he also shares his views and insights about them.

work.summary: I use Fiverr as a platform to provide my full-stack developer services to people all around the world.
I joined Kamal Tech, a startup, to complete one of their projects, which I concluded within the given timeline.
I joined E-Adz as a junior developer to gain professional experience, where I developed and fixed different kinds of PHP applications.
